Title: Setting Leadership Boundaries With Friends and Profits
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       A business owner who hired his friends and how it affected their relationships

•       Some of the key leadership lessons from the Freedom Convoy with Tamara Lich 

•       How you can reward your employees without using money

•       What to do with your tithe when your business is contributing a lot to your local church


Links mentioned in this episode:

•       The EntreLeadership Podcast

•       Tamara Lich’s book: Hold The Line: My Story From The Heart Of The Freedom Convoy
